Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
Acknowledgment Statement: Please cite/reference the use of dbGaP data by including the dbGaP accession phs001807.v1.p1. Additionally, use the following statement to acknowledge the submitter(s) of this study:
Acknowledgments Members of consortium PI: Ramon Bataller, University of Pittsburgh
Philipe Mathurin, Alexander Louvet and Laurent Dubuquoy. Institut national de la santé et de la recherche médicale, Lille, France. Peter Starkel. Service d'Hépato-gastroentérologie, Cliniques Universitaires Saint-Luc, Brussels, Belgium. Joan Caballeria and Pau Sancho-Bru. Consorci Institut d'Investigacions Biomèdiques August Pi i Sunyer (IDIBAPS), Barcelona, Spain. Constantino Fontdevila. Liver Transplant Unit, Department of Surgery, Hospital Clinic, University of Barcelona, Barcelona, Spain
This study was funded by the National Institute on Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism (NIAAA), NIH, Bethesda, MD, USA

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Alcoholism, IRB, NPU, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ALC-IRB-NPU-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Alcoholism and related disorders. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
